attributes.action: Give NHS 50% discount on Transport for London Fares
attributes.additional_details: NHS Workers deserves better, during pandemic most of them did not have a chance to choose a way of working from home, they have been travelling to work and paying full amount of fares, while others could stay home and save money on travelling. Police Officers have access for free public transport, now it is a time where NHS workers should have at least 50% discount on public transport.
attributes.background: Give 50% discount on Transport for London fares for each NHS worker who will apply.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
